plot: A vengeful spirit passes herself of as human and gains a family's trust, only to murder them one-by-one.
title: Yeogokseong
plot_es: A vengeful spirit passes herself of as human and gains a family's trust, only to murder them one-by-one.
plot_en: A vengeful spirit passes herself of as human and gains a family's trust, only to murder them one-by-one.
